renderpass.code:
// coloring connected componant variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/flK3zc
// variant with shadows https://shadertoy.com/view/flGGR3

#define hue(v) vec4( .6 + .6 * cos( .5+(v)  + vec3(0,23,21)  ) ,1 )

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    N*= 1.5;
    if (length(iMouse.xy)>10.) N *= exp2(4.*(iMouse.y/R.y-.2)); // mouse zoom
    float s = sqrt(3.), r = 1./s, a;
    vec2 U = (N * u / R.y) * mat2(s,-1,0,2)/4. + 4.*iTime, // to tilted space
         I = floor(U), V;                                // I : hexa tile ID
    U = fract(U) *  mat2(1,.5,0,s/2.) - vec2(1,r)/2.;    // U : local coords
    U += U.y*s+abs(U.x) < 0. ? I.y--,   + vec2( 0,r)     // Set to hexagon over the 3
        : U.x < 0.           ? I.x--, -.5*vec2(-1,r)     //   covered by the tilted cell
        :                             -.5*vec2( 1,r);
 // I.x += N;
    O-=O;                                                // --- draw tiles

    int t = typ(I);                                      // random tile type
    a = float(ang(I))/6. *6.2831853;                     // random tile rotation
    U *= mat2( cos( a - vec4(0,1.57,-1.57,0) ) );        // do rotation

#define S(n,v)   vec2(n, smoothstep( N/R.y, 0., v ) )    // Draw among 3 types:
#define C(n,v,r) S(n, abs(length(v)-r/2.) )           
#define sha(x,y) S(0, length(U-vec2(x,y))-.1)    
#define max(a,b) ( (a).y>(b).y ? a : b )
    V = t==0 ?  max(max(C(1, U - vec2(.5,-r/2.) , r),    // 3 short turns
                        C(2, U + vec2(.5, r/2.) , r)),
                        C(0, U - vec2(0,r), r) )
      : t==1 ?  max(max(C(1, U - vec2(.5,-s/2.), s),     // 2 larges + 1 short
                        C(2, U + vec2(.5, s/2.), s) - sha(0,-.17) ),   // - shadow
                        C(0, U - vec2(0,r), r))
      :         max(max(C(2, U - vec2(.5,-s/2.), s),     // 2 larges + 1 line
                        C(1, U + vec2(.5,-s/2.), s) - sha(-.08,.12) ), // - shadow
                        S(0, abs(U.x*s+U.y) / 2.)   - sha(.08,-.12) ); // - shadow
    O += V.y;                                            // Vx: #thread Vy: mask

    O *= hue(T(I)[int(V.x)] );                     // show connected components
    if ( keyToggle(9) && int(T(I)[int(V.x)])%10 > 0) O*=.3; // TAB: enlight 10%
 // if (iMouse.z > 0.) { O += (1.-O.a)*.4*hue(6.28*fract(1e4*sin(I.y + I.x*N))); return; } // if click show tiling
}

float N = 32.;                                    // vertical number of tiles

#define typ(U) int(T(U).a)/8                      // decode tile type and angle
#define ang(U) int(T(U).a)%8

#define R               iResolution.xy
#define T(U)            texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(U+R) % ivec2(R), 0 )
#define keyToggle(c)  ( texelFetch(iChannel3,ivec2(c,2),0).x > 0.)
#define keyDown(c)    ( texelFetch(iChannel3,ivec2(c,1),0).x > 0.)
